channel.title: Chaing what a npc says
channel.description:
difficulty:1/10
ok so first of all open npchandler
find what then npc says what u want to change
*ex. hans could be saying :welcome to ........*
memarise what the npc said
hold ctrl + f
and type in what the npc said
it should come up with this
if (npcs[i].npcType == 0) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT THE NPC SAYS!"; }
i just used hans for an example
next: look for this [i].textupdate = "WHAT THE NPC SAYS!"
change the words in speech marks to what you want it to say
last step:
compile,restart then run your server and then you are done

item.title: Chaing what a npc says
item.dc:creator: @ash_dude34 ash dude34
item.description:
@ash_dude34 wrote:

difficulty:1/10

ok so first of all open npchandler

find what then npc says what u want to change

ex. hans could be saying :welcome to …

memarise what the npc said

hold ctrl + f

and type in what the npc said

it should come up with this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 0) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “WHAT THE NPC SAYS!”;
}

i just used hans for an example

next:
look for this
[i].textupdate = “WHAT THE NPC SAYS!”

change the words in speech marks to what you want it to say

last step:

compile,restart then run your server and then you are done

Read full topic
